mapper.sql: ID, eventID, TITLE, LOCATION, TIME, CONTENT, weather, towncount, demaver, peoplesum, hazardcount, TYPE, COUNT, CREATOR_TIME
mapper.insert: insert into t_jdata (ID, eventID, TITLE, LOCATION, TIME, CONTENT, weather, towncount, demaver, peoplesum, hazardcount, TYPE, COUNT, CREATOR_TIME) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{eventid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{weather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{towncount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{demaver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{peoplesum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hazardcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

update t_jdata
eventID = #{eventid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update t_jdata set eventID = #{eventid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TITLE = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LOCATION = #{location,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TIME = #{time,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, weather = #{weather,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, towncount = #{towncount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, demaver = #{demaver,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, peoplesum = #{peoplesum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hazardcount = #{hazardcount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, COUNT = #{count,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CREATOR_TIME = #{creatorTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from t_jdata
AND eventID LIKE '%${eventid}%'
AND TYPE = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
ORDER BY eventID DESC
